response.overview: Ranga (S.S.L.C) is a 2004 Indian Kannada-language Masala film directed by Yogaraj Bhat and produced by N. Kumar. It stars Sudeep and Ramya in lead roles.The film was an average success at the box office and was later dubbed into Hindi as Ranga Dada in 2013. The Music was composed by Sandeep Chowta.
response.title: ranga (s.s.l.c)
